remarks:
Restricted quantifier version of ~ 19.29r ; variation of ~ r19.29 . (Contributed by NM, 31-Aug-1999.) 

---

 Variation of Theorem 19.29 of [Margaris] p. 90 with restricted quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Aug-1999.)
statement: r19.29r $p |- ( ( E. x e. A ph /\ A. x e. A ps ) -> E. x e. A ( ph /\ ps ) ) $.
